text: Gary Wells (1957-2020) was an American motorcycle daredevil. On September 15, 1980, during a taping of the reality television show That's Incredible! he attempted to jump the fountains at Caesars Palace, a stunt made famous by Evel Knievel's failed attempt, but also crashed and was severely injured. Gary Wells passed away in Glendale, AZ on August 6, 2020. ==References== * http://www.cyclejumpers.com/garywells.html - Cycle Jumpers - Gary Wells * https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMRZbYcoK1U - Video of the Caesar's Palace jump ==External links== * http://www.garywells.com - Personal website Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American stunt performers
title: Gary Wells (motorcyclist)
